original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Buddhavagga
analyzed: buddha vagga

original: 3. Gihipabbajitasammāpaṭipattipañha
analyzed: gihi pabbajita sammāpaṭipatti pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘gihino vāhaṁ, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa vā sammāpaṭipattiṁ vaṇṇemi, gihī vā, bhikkhave,
analyzed: gihinaḥ vā aha bhikkhave pabbajitassa vā sammā paṭipattim vaṇṇemi gihī vā bhikkhave

original: pabbajito vā sammāpaṭipanno sammāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalan’ti.
analyzed: pabbajitaḥ vā sammāpaṭipannaḥ sammāpaṭipatta adhikaraṇa hetu ārādhakaḥ hoti ñāyam dhammam kusalanti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, gihī odātavasano kāmabhogī puttadārasambādhasayanaṁ ajjhāvasanto
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena gihī odāta vasanaḥ kāma bhogī putta dāra sambādha sayanam ajjhāvasanto

original: kāsikacandanaṁ paccanubhonto mālāgandhavilepanaṁ dhārento jātarūparajataṁ sādiyanto
analyzed: kāsika candanam paccanubhontaḥ mālā gandha vilepanam dhārentaḥ jātarūpa rajatam

original: maṇikuṇḍalavicittamoḷibaddho sammāpaṭipanno ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalaṁ,
analyzed: maṇi kuṇḍala vicitta moḷi baddho sammā paṭipanno ārādhako hoti ñāyam dhammam kusala

original: pabbajitopi bhaṇḍukāsāvavatthavasano parapiṇḍamajjhupagato catūsu sīlakkhandhesu
analyzed: pabbajitaḥ api bhaṇḍu kāsāva vattha vasano para piṇḍa majjhupagato catūsu sīlakkhandhesu

original: sammāparipūrakārī diyaḍḍhesu sikkhāpadasatesu samādāya vattanto terasasu dhutaguṇesu
analyzed: sammā paripūra kārī diyaḍḍhesu sikkhāpada satesu samādāya vattanto terasasu dhuta guṇesu

original: anavasesaṁ vattanto sammāpaṭipanno ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalaṁ.
analyzed: anavasesam vattanto sammāpaṭipannaḥ ārādhakaḥ hoti ñāyam dhammam kusala

original: Tattha, bhante, ko viseso gihino vā pabbajitassa vā?
analyzed: tattha bhante kaḥ visesaḥ gihinaḥ vā pabbajitassa vā

original: Aphalaṁ hoti tapokammaṁ, niratthakā pabbajjā.
analyzed: aphalam hoti tapo kamma niratthakā pabbajjā

original: Vañjhā sikkhāpadagopanā, moghaṁ dhutaguṇasamādānaṁ, kiṁ tattha dukkhamanuciṇṇena, nanu nāma sukheneva sukhaṁ adhigantabban”ti.
analyzed: vañjhā sikkhāpada gopanā mogham dhuta guṇa samādāna kim tattha dukkha manuciṇṇena nanu nāma sukhena iva sukham adhigantabbanti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā

original: ‘gihino vāhaṁ, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa vā sammāpaṭipattiṁ vaṇṇemi, gihī vā, bhikkhave,
analyzed: gihinaḥ vā aha bhikkhave pabbajitassa vā sammā paṭipattim vaṇṇemi gihī vā bhikkhave

original: pabbajito vā sammāpaṭipanno sammāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetu ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalan’ti.
analyzed: pabbajitaḥ vā sammāpaṭipannaḥ sammāpaṭipatta adhikaraṇa hetu ārādhakaḥ hoti ñāyam dhammam kusalanti

original: Evametaṁ, mahārāja, sammāpaṭipannova seṭṭho, pabbajitopi, mahārāja, ‘pabbajitomhī’ti na sammā paṭipajjeyya, atha kho so ārakāva sāmaññā, ārakāva brahmaññā, pageva gihī odātavasano.
analyzed: evam eta mahā rāja sammā paṭipannaḥ uva seṭṭhaḥ pabbajitaḥ api mahā rāja pabbajitaḥ amhi iti na sammā paṭipajjeyya atha kho so ārakā va sāmaññā ārakā va brahmaññā pagā iva gihī odāta vasanaḥ

original: Gihīpi, mahārāja, sammāpaṭipanno ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalaṁ, pabbajitopi, mahārāja, sammāpaṭipanno ārādhako hoti ñāyaṁ dhammaṁ kusalaṁ.
analyzed: gihī ipi mahā rāja sammāpaṭipannaḥ ārādhakaḥ hoti ñāyam dhammam kusala pabbajitaḥ api mahā rāja sammāpaṭipannaḥ ārādhakaḥ hoti ñāyam dhammam kusala

original: Api ca kho, mahārāja, pabbajitova sāmaññassa issaro adhipati;
analyzed: api ca kho mahā rāja pabbajitaḥ uva sāmaññassa issaraḥ adhipati

original: pabbajjā, mahārāja, bahuguṇā anekaguṇā appamāṇaguṇā, na sakkā pabbajjāya guṇaṁ parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ.
analyzed: pabbajjāḥ mahā rāja bahu guṇāḥ aneka guṇāḥ appamāṇa guṇāḥ na sakkā pabbajjāya guṇam parimāṇam kātu

original: Yathā, mahārāja, kāmadadassa maṇiratanassa na sakkā dhanena aggho parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ ‘ettakaṁ maṇiratanassa mūlan’ti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kāmadadassa maṇi ratanassa na sakkā dhanena aggho parimāṇam kātum ettakam maṇi ratanassa mūlan ti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, pabbajjā bahuguṇā anekaguṇā appamāṇaguṇā, na sakkā pabbajjāya guṇaṁ parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja pabbajjā bahu guṇāḥ aneka guṇāḥ appamāṇa guṇāḥ na sakkā pabbajjāya guṇam parimāṇam kātu

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, mahāsamudde ūmiyo na sakkā parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ ‘ettakā mahāsamudde ūmiyo’ti;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja mahā samudde ūmiyaḥ na sakkā parimāṇam kātum ettakāḥ mahā samudde ūmiyaḥ ti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, pabbajjā bahuguṇā anekaguṇā appamāṇaguṇā, na sakkā pabbajjāya guṇaṁ parimāṇaṁ kātuṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja pabbajjā bahu guṇāḥ aneka guṇāḥ appamāṇa guṇāḥ na sakkā pabbajjāya guṇam parimāṇam kātu

original: Pabbajitassa, mahārāja, yaṁ kiñci karaṇīyaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ khippameva samijjhati no cirarattāya.
analyzed: pabbajitassa mahā rāja yam kiñci sabbam tam khippam eva samijjhati no cira rattāya

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Pabbajito, mahārāja, appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṁsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo nirālayo
analyzed: pabbajitaḥ mahā rāja appicchaḥ hoti santuṭṭhaḥ pavivittaḥ a sasaṭṭhaḥ āraddha vīriyaḥ nirālayaḥ

original: aniketo paripuṇṇasīlo sallekhitācāro dhutappaṭipattikusalo hoti, taṁ kāraṇā pabbajitassa
analyzed: aniketaḥ paripuṇṇa sīlaḥ sallekhita ācāraḥ dhuta ppaṭipatti kusalaḥ hoti tam kāraṇā pabbajitassa

original: yaṁ kiñci karaṇīyaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ khippameva samijjhati no cirarattāya.
analyzed: yam kiñci sabbam tam khippam eva samijjhati no cira rattāya

original: Yathā, mahārāja, niggaṇṭhisamasudhotaujuvimalanārāco susajjito sammā vahati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja niggaṇṭhi sama sudhā ūta oju vimala nārācaḥ su sajjitaḥ sammā vahati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, pabbajitassa yaṁ kiñci karaṇīyaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ khippameva samijjhati no cirarattāyā”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja pabbajitassa yat kiñci sabbam tam khippam eva samijjhati no cira rattāya ati

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Gihipabbajitasammāpaṭipattipañho tatiyo.
analyzed: gihi pabbajita sammāpaṭipatti pañhaḥ tatiyaḥ
